title: Go Tell It on the Mountain - point of view is

content.prompt: The point of view in the passage is that of a

choices.label: participating observer who is partial to John
third-person narrator who is aware of John's thoughts
nonparticipating spectator who is unfamiliar with John's thoughts
first-person narrator who chooses to speak of himself in the third-person

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Identify and explain the function of point of view in a narrative.
